mapper.select: /* [com.coway.trust.biz.homecare.po.impl.HcCreateDeliveryMapper.selectPoDetailList] - KR JIN */ SELECT A.PO_NO , A.PO_DTL_NO , A.STOCK_ID , A.STOCK_CODE , (SELECT STK_DESC FROM SYS0026M WHERE STK_ID = A.STOCK_ID AND STK_CODE = A.STOCK_CODE) AS STOCK_NAME , A.SUPLY_ITEM_CD --, A.PO_QTY , A.CONFIRM_QTY , NVL(D.ACTUAL_QTY, 0) AS ACTUAL_QTY , NVL(B.EXT_QTY, 0) AS EXT_QTY , NVL(C.QC_FAIL_QTY, 0) AS QC_FAIL_QTY , ( NVL(D.ACTUAL_QTY, 0) - NVL(B.EXT_QTY, 0) + NVL(C.QC_FAIL_QTY, 0) ) AS AVAILABLE_QTY , 0 AS DO_QTY , A.UOM , (SELECT CODE_NAME FROM SYS0013M WHERE CODE_MASTER_ID = '42' AND CODE_ID = A.UOM) AS UOM_NAME , A.PO_UPRC , A.SUPLY_PRC , A.TAX , A.TAX_CD , (SELECT CODE_NAME FROM SYS0013M WHERE CODE_MASTER_ID = '430' AND CODE_ID = A.TAX_CD) AS TAX_NAME , A.LOCAL_AMT , (A.SUPLY_PRC+A.TAX) AS TOTAL FROM HMC0005D A , ( SELECT PO_NO , PO_DTL_NO , SUM(DELVRY_QTY) AS EXT_QTY FROM HMC0008D WHERE PO_NO = #{sPoNo} AND USE_YN = 'Y' GROUP BY PO_NO, PO_DTL_NO ) B , ( SELECT PO_NO , PO_DTL_NO , SUM(QC_FAIL_QTY) AS QC_FAIL_QTY FROM HMC0010D WHERE 1 = 1 AND PO_NO = #{sPoNo} AND USE_YN = 'Y' GROUP BY PO_NO, PO_DTL_NO ) C , ( SELECT PO_NO , PO_DTL_NO , SUM(ACTUAL_QTY) AS ACTUAL_QTY FROM HMC0006D WHERE 1 = 1 AND PO_NO = #{sPoNo} GROUP BY PO_NO, PO_DTL_NO ) D WHERE A.PO_NO = B.PO_NO (+) AND A.PO_DTL_NO = B.PO_DTL_NO (+) AND A.PO_NO = C.PO_NO (+) AND A.PO_DTL_NO = C.PO_DTL_NO (+) AND A.PO_NO = D.PO_NO (+) AND A.PO_DTL_NO = D.PO_DTL_NO (+) AND A.PO_NO = #{sPoNo} AND A.USE_YN = 'Y' ORDER BY A.PO_NO, A.PO_DTL_NO

/* [com.coway.trust.biz.homecare.po.impl.HcCreateDeliveryMapper.selectDeliveryList] - KR JIN */ SELECT ROWNUM AS RNUM , A.HMC_DELVRY_NO , B.HMC_DELVRY_NO_DTL_NO , B.STOCK_ID , B.STOCK_CODE , (SELECT STK_DESC FROM SYS0026M WHERE STK_ID = B.STOCK_ID AND STK_CODE = B.STOCK_CODE) AS STOCK_NAME , B.DELVRY_QTY , B.PO_NO , B.PO_DTL_NO , TO_DATE(A.DELVRY_DT, 'YYYYMMDD') AS DELVRY_DT , A.DELVRY_GI_DT AS DELVRY_GI_DT , A.DELVRY_STATUS , (SELECT CODE FROM SYS0013M WHERE CODE_MASTER_ID = '432' AND CODE_ID = A.DELVRY_STATUS) AS DELVRY_STATUS_CODE , DECODE(A.DELVRY_GI_DT, NULL, 'N', 'Y') AS PRINT_YN FROM HMC0007M A , HMC0008D B WHERE A.HMC_DELVRY_NO = B.HMC_DELVRY_NO AND A.PO_NO = B.PO_NO AND A.USE_YN = 'Y' AND B.USE_YN = 'Y' AND A.PO_NO = #{sPoNo} ORDER BY A.HMC_DELVRY_NO ASC, B.HMC_DELVRY_NO_DTL_NO ASC

/* [com.coway.trust.biz.homecare.po.impl.HcCreateDeliveryMapper.selectHmcDelvryNo] - KR JIN */ SELECT 'HDVR'||TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYMMDD')|| LPAD(NVL(MAX(TO_NUMBER(SUBSTR(HMC_DELVRY_NO , 11))), 0)+1, 5, '0') AS DELVRY_NO FROM HMC0007M WHERE HMC_DELVRY_NO LIKE 'HDVR'||TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYMMDD')||'%'
mapper.insert: /* [com.coway.trust.biz.homecare.po.impl.HcCreateDeliveryMapper.insertHcCreateDeliveryDetail] - KR JIN */ INSERT INTO HMC0008D -- Delivery Detail ( HMC_DELVRY_NO --Delivery Number , HMC_DELVRY_NO_DTL_NO --Delivery Detail Number , STOCK_ID --Material , STOCK_CODE --Material Code , DELVRY_QTY --Delivery Qty , PO_NO --PO No , PO_DTL_NO --Po Detail No , USE_YN --USE_YN , CRT_DT --Create Date , CRT_USER_ID --Create User Id , UPD_DT --Update Date , UPD_USER_ID --Update User Id )VALUES( #{delvryNo} --Delivery Number , (SELECT NVL(MAX(HMC_DELVRY_NO_DTL_NO), 0)+1 FROM HMC0008D WHERE HMC_DELVRY_NO = #{delvryNo}) , #{stockId} --Material , #{stockCode} --Material Code , #{doQty} --Delivery Qty , #{poNo} --PO No , #{poDtlNo} --Po Detail No , 'Y' , SYSDATE , #{crtUserId} --Create User Id , SYSDATE , #{updUserId} --Update User Id )
mapper.select: /* [com.coway.trust.biz.homecare.po.impl.HcCreateDeliveryMapper.selectProductionCompar] - KR JIN */ SELECT A.PO_NO , A.PO_DTL_NO , NVL(B.ACTUAL_QTY, 0) AS ACTUAL_QTY , NVL(C.DELVRY_QTY, 0) AS DELVRY_QTY FROM HMC0005D A , ( SELECT PO_NO , PO_DTL_NO , SUM(ACTUAL_QTY) AS ACTUAL_QTY FROM HMC0006D WHERE PO_NO = #{poNo} GROUP BY PO_NO, PO_DTL_NO ) B , ( SELECT PO_NO , PO_DTL_NO , SUM(DELVRY_QTY) AS DELVRY_QTY FROM HMC0008D WHERE USE_YN = 'Y' AND PO_NO = #{poNo} GROUP BY PO_NO, PO_DTL_NO ) C WHERE A.PO_NO = B.PO_NO (+) AND A.PO_DTL_NO = B.PO_DTL_NO (+) AND A.PO_NO = C.PO_NO (+) AND A.PO_DTL_NO = C.PO_DTL_NO (+) AND A.USE_YN = 'Y' AND A.PO_NO = #{poNo} ORDER BY PO_NO, PO_DTL_NO
